content: Back in the present, the Ammo Knights question the mermaids about the Straw Hats, suspecting them of the kidnappings, although they are stumped as to why they would do something like that after acting so friendly. Fukaboshi questions Madam Shyarly if she is certain about the prediction she made. When she confirms it, Fukaboshi comments that they will have to "deal" with the problem as soon as possible.
